data.Instruction: This application works like this: tap on top or tap on bottom to interact, swipe right to get more information and swipe left to go back
data.Credits: This app work is made by Luca Contato, Laura Díaz, Basilio Garcia,  y Nelson Martín.
data.LoadingBase: Please be patient, I'm making stuff
data.Uploading: Uploading photo, I'll try to describe it for you...
data.Error: mistakes happens, and somethings goes wrong...sorry.
data.Update: An update is avaiable! I'll get better!
data.Permission: Please accept permission, I'll need it for do magic stuff
data.Unsupported: Your browser device seems doesn't support some stuff, please update or find other browser like Chrome
data.lvlMain_help: Tap on top to enter a photo and tap on bottom to show photos
data.lvlPhoto_help: Tap on top to snap a photo and swipe left to back.
Tap on top to share and swipe left to back.
data.lvlFeed_help: Tap on top to go previous photo, tap on bottom to go next photo, swipe right to more information and swipe left to back.
data.lvlComment_help: I am going to read the comments, swipe left to back.
